t: Judge rules Amazon must reinstate fired warehouse worker | Health | richmond.com
s: A judge has ruled Amazon must reinstate a former warehouse employee who was fired in the early days of the pandemic, saying the company “unlawfully” terminated the worker who led a protest calling for Amazon to do more to protect employees against COVID-19.

t: Financing fake news: Nike and Amazon advertise on Covid conspiracy…
s: April 5, 2024 - Dozens of the world’s biggest brands, including Nike, Amazon and Ted Baker, have been advertising on websites spreading Covid misinformation, such as claims that powerful people secretly engineered the pandemic and vaccines have caused thousands of deaths, the Bureau can reveal.
